name: Pinic Party 2D
description:
Early phase of a simple 2D single-screen arcade-style platformer. You are an adventurer who just wanted to have a picnic, but pesky insects stole your food and scattered it everywhere. Collect all of your food and store it safely in your picnic basket to win.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys to move, Spacebar/Click to pick up and drop the food.
